long_description: Ideal for travel and good first impressions, the rugged Patagonia Kiragg shirt combines 60% organic cotton for softness with 40% recycled polyester for durability, easy care and wrinkle-resistance. Clean details like offset shoulder seams and rear back yoke stitching, and chambray-lined interior yoke, collar stand and cuffs make this a classic. Drop in chest pockets have button closures. Patagonia Kiragg shirt has a slim fit.
short_description: Ideal for travel and good first impressions, the rugged Patagonia Kiragg shirt combines 60% organic cotton for softness with 40% recycled polyester for durability, easy care and wrinkle-resistance.
